title: Debunking the Myth of a Single Creator with Justin Cappos
description: Today, erxes had the opportunity to chat with Justin Cappos, professor in the Computer Science and Engineering department at New York University. We talked about his involvement in various open source projects, including TUF, a project aimed at helping developers maintain the security of their software update systems.
